mapper.select: select id,name,'community' type,''parenttype ,''parentid,comp_id compId from r_community where id = #{id} and is_delete=0
SELECT * FROM r_community LEFT JOIN s_user_comm ON r_community.id = s_user_comm.comm_id WHERE s_user_comm.user_id = #{id} AND r_community.is_delete = 0

select dd.name compName,cc.name areaName,aa.name userName,ee.name orgName,aa.type,aa.state from s_user aa left join s_user_comm bb on aa.id = bb.user_id left join r_community cc on bb.comm_id = cc.id left join s_company dd on aa.comp_id = dd.id left join s_org ee on aa.org_id = ee.id where cc.id = #{id} and aa.is_delete=0

SELECT bb.name areaName,cc.name compName,dd.name roleName ,aa.id,aa.begin_date,aa.end_date,aa.no,aa.type,aa.state,aa.remark FROM `r_comm_role_agreement` aa left join r_community bb on aa.comm_id = bb.id left join s_company cc on aa.comp_id = cc.id left join s_role dd on aa.role_id = dd.id where aa.comm_id = #{id} and aa.is_delete=0
